thread.title: Good service, good room, good food, good value considering location
thread.title_full: Good service, good room, good food, good value considering location - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mow2512
title: Good service, good room, good food, good value considering location
text:
Excellent service, polite staff, no signs or sounds from the renovation works, restaurant was a nice experience and I highly recommend the scotch egg, room was comfortable and the sofa and balcony made it much more of an experience.
Value was ok considering it was a stones throw from the Tower of london and the sights we went to see.
Only small gripe would be for the price we paid for an upgraded balcony room I wouldn't have expected to find cheap coffee/tea facilities and limited supplies of milk cartons etc. Other hotels we considered had espresso machines for similar prices.
